content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: DOMAIN
      operator: starts_with
      value: AP
    - name: DOMAIN
      operator: has_not_equal_length
      value: 4
Core:
  Id: CORE-000181
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error when AP-- domain value length is not equal to 4.
Outcome:
  Message: AP-- Domain value length is not equal to 4.
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Domain
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0309
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Each domain dataset is distinguished by a unique,
                  two-character code
                Document: IG v3.4
                Section: '2.2'
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - ALL
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Raise an error when AP-- domain value length is not equal to 4.

Outcome.Message: AP-- Domain value length is not equal to 4.

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Each domain dataset is distinguished by a unique, two-character code
